entities.name: stone cold
entities.description: Stone Cold is mentioned as the one who drank half of the soup in one gulp.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, and she ruffled her feathers and gave him a look of deep disgust when he offered her soggy vegetables.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who drank half of the soup, offered Hedwig soggy vegetables, and was worried about not turning up at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place where Harry should turn up, but he is worried that someone might be sent to see why he hadn't come back.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as people who might not let Harry go, and someone might need to be sent to persuade them.

relationships.description: Harry offered Hedwig soggy vegetables, but she refused them with a look of deep disgust.
Stone Cold drank half of the soup in one gulp.
Harry is worried about not turning up at Hogwarts, and he wonders what would happen if he didn't go back.
Harry is worried that the Dursleys might not let him go, and someone might need to be sent to persuade them.
